summary: Easily add your custom soundtrack for dragon- and horse-riding separately
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT: This mod does not provide any Music files! You must use your own files by converting them into .wav-files!

Description
========================
Add your own custom Soundtrack for horse- and dragon riding! You can use different soundtracks for each mount.

Installation
========================
- Extract the file into your Data-Folder or use NMM
- Browse in your Data-Folder to "music/ridingsoundtrack"
- replace the files in that folder with your own .wav-files and DONT CHANGE THE FILE NAMES ("riding" for horse-riding, "dragonriding" for dragon-riding). If you want to use the same files for both, replace the "riding" and the "dragonriding" file with the same file. If you dont want to replace all three files, leave them unchanged. they are placeholders with 1 second silence, you will not recognize them in game.
- Enjoy your custom music while riding on horse or dragon
author: jesuzz
